mods.abstract: Light Crust Doughboys radio transcription dated 1936-05-16. Featuring Dick 'Bashful' Reinhart, Bert 'Buddy' Dodson, Clifford 'Doctor' Gross, Kenneth 'Abner' Pitts, Muryel 'Zeke' Campbell, Marvin 'Junior' Montgomery, and announcer Eddie Dunn. Sponsored by Burrus Mill's Light Crust flour.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
